[[inst_subi]]
==== SUBI

*Syntax:* subi SrcL, uimm, ->{t, u, Rd}

*Description:* Subtract source register or immediate from register.

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_subi.svg[SUBI encoding,width=800]

*Group:* ALU
